message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "To analyze the impact of extractive industries on economic growth, we use dataset collected from World Development Indicators and the Extractives Industry Transparency Initiative (EITI)", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "Extractives Industry Transparency Initiative (EITI)"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This study investigates the relationship between job training and wages using data from National Health Interview Survey (NHIS) and Medical Expenditure Panel Survey (MEPS)", "dataset": ["National Health Interview Survey (NHIS)", "Medical Expenditure Panel Survey (MEPS)"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "To estimate the impacts of rural electrification programs on agricultural productivity, we utilize data from Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS) and Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture (LSMS-ISA)", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS)", "Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture (LSMS-ISA)"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We explore the effects of early childhood nutrition on cognitive development by utilizing data from Bangladesh Integrated Household Survey (BIHS) and Young Lives", "dataset": ["Bangladesh Integrated Household Survey (BIHS)", "Young Lives"], "topic": ["Nutrition", "Education"]}, {"sentence": "This paper analyzes the gender wage gap across different sectors in Indonesia using data from Labor Force Survey (SAKERNAS) and Indonesia Family Life Survey (IFLS)", "dataset": ["Labor Force Survey (SAKERNAS)", "Indonesia Family Life Survey (IFLS)"], "topic": ["Gender", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate the effect of infrastructure investments on economic growth, we combine data from the International Road Federation (IRF) and World Development Indicators", "dataset": ["International Road Federation (IRF)", "World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Infrastructure", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We use multiple datasets, including National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) and European Space Agency (ESA), to study the impact of climate change on food security in Sub-Saharan Africa", "dataset": ["National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)", "European Space Agency (ESA)"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This study examines the relationship between financial inclusion and economic growth using data from Global Findex and World Development Indicators", "dataset": ["Global Findex", "World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We investigate the effectiveness of public-private partnerships in infrastructure development by analyzing data from Public-Private Infrastructure Advisory Facility (PPIAF) and World Bank's Private Participation in Infrastructure Database (PPI Database)", "dataset": ["Public-Private Infrastructure Advisory Facility (PPIAF)", "World Bank's Private Participation in Infrastructure Database (PPI Database)"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Infrastructure"]}, {"sentence": "To study the impact of water scarcity on agricultural productivity, we utilize data from Future Water project and Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture (LSMS-ISA)", "dataset": ["Future Water project", "Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture (LSMS-ISA)"], "topic": ["Water", "Agriculture and Food"]}]
